name: Calligraphy Art
description:
SD is bad with text? No problem!

You wont ever tell what's written in calligraphy art anyway.

It's more of an experiment than a legit lora, but since it's capable to produce some cool pics I figured that i might aswell share.

Used with "calligraphy art" tag and around 0.7 weight, feel free adjust for ur case and model accordingly.
If its not working out try to guide SD with tags like "lettering", "text", "calligraphy", etc in prompt.

Enjoy and share your Generations!

meta.prompt: calligraphy art, epic realistic, perfect body girl with long hair, close up, artistic photo, lettering body art on her chest, perky tits, complex pose, radial abstract lettering painted wall backdrop, dynamic angle, studio room, studio lights, brush strokes, intricate monogram, asymmetry, aesthetic, complex background, red and white theme <lora:Calligraphy art v2:0.9>, faded, hdr, hyperdetailed, (artstation:1.4), cinematic, dramatic light, (intricate details:1.1)
meta.negativePrompt: bw, braid, floral, tantric, totem, simple background, low quality, worst quality (EasyNegative:0.8), (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, (mutated hands and fingers:1.4), disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, blurry, amputation
